name: HENTAICRAFT
description:
HENTAICRAFT is a sandbox with an endless open world that consists of cubes. In this game there is no pre-written plot, you have to create your own story yourself. No one will tell you where to go and what to do, but you will surely understand everything yourself, because this fascinating cubic world is familiar to all of us. Explore different biomes, from hot deserts and green forests, to snow-covered northern wastelands. Mine ore in deep caves, swim the seas and try not to get caught by the monsters that come out of their holes at night... Welcome to HENTAICRAFT!

Main Features


  • An endless, open world to explore. Different biomes, dynamic change of time of day and weather conditions.
  • Resource management. Various methods of resource extraction. Unique resources in different biomes, as well as on the ground and underground.
  • A construction system limited only by your imagination. Diverse crafting system. Lots of recipes.
  • Different types of dangerous monsters, weapons to fight them.
  • Pleasant visual and sound design
  • And the opportunity to play as a cute anime girl!
This game is a parody.
